body.name: Modern Threads Soft Microfiber Rose Printed Sheets - Luxurious Microfiber Bed Sheets - Includes Flat Sheet, Fitted Sheet with Deep Pockets, & Pillowcases
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 27 mins
FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: A Contemporary & Luxurious Rose-Printed Sheet Set: Drape your bed in our supple microfiber rose-printed sheet set and enhance your bedding with an elegant upgrade. Made with 100% microfiber polyester, our 4-piece full set sheets set includes a flat sheet, a fitted sheet with deep pockets, and two pillowcases. Perfect for your bedroom or guest room, layer them with a comforter or duvet of your choice and add a vibrant accent to your décor.

Crafted With Incredibly Soft Microfiber Polyester: Ever wished you could take those superbly soft sheets from your hotel room and lay them on your own bed? We wanted to replicate that quality with our microfiber brushed yarns and breathable blend of cotton and polyester. Immerse yourself in tranquility every time you lay your head down at night.

Designed To Last Through All Seasons: Our contemporary rose-printed bedding sheets & pillowcases aren't just ultra-soft and stylish, they're also designed to last all year round. Boasting a tough cotton & polyester blend, they're compatible with all seasons and will last through years of wear and tear without fading--no matter how many times you toss them in the washer. Adorn your bed with these floral bed sheets and sleep cozily no matter the temperature outside.

Fits Modern Deep Pocket Mattresses: Tired of waking up to see your sheets have ridden up your mattress again? We've got you and your mattress covered with our deep pocket fitted sheet. Crafted to snugly fit today’s thick mattresses, we designed our fitted sheet with a full elastic perimeter that expands to fit securely. Our full size bed sheets include a 96" x 81" flat sheet, 54" x 75" x 14" fitted sheet, and two 20" x 40" pillowcases.

A Family Operated Brand With Over 40 Years Experience: Our family-operated brand has created elegant home textiles for more than 40 years, with every item hand-designed by talented designers in our California studio. At the intersection of luxury and functionality, we source only high-quality materials to enhance your home with décor you can be proud of. Make Modern Threads your go-to interior design brand and completely upgrade your space into the elegant oasis of your dreams.
body.description: A Timeless Rose-Printed Sheets Set: Give your bedroom or guest bedroom an elegant upgrade with these vibrant rose-printed sheets. Crafted from 100% microfiber, they're soothing to the touch and won't lose their contemporary pattern no matter how many times you wash them. Our comfortable bedding set includes a flat sheet, fitted sheet, and silky pillowcases. Boasts Incredibly Soft Microfiber Fabric: Nestle comfortably inside these luxurious microfiber sheets every time you lay your head down at night. Crafted with a uniquely soft fabric and durable stitching, our sheets are made to last and won't fade through years of beautifully restful nights and regular washings. Made to Last All Year 'Round: Instead of changing your sheets to accommodate the weather, adorn your king-sized bed with our contemporary floral sheets during any season. Our breathable & durable bedding keeps you cool during warmer seasons and snuggled during cooler seasons. Make this supple set your go-to all year long! Fits Plush Deep-Pocket Mattresses: We designed our fitted sheet with deep pockets that snugly fit today’s thicker bed mattresses. Instead of placing the elastic just on the sides, we designed our fitted sheet with elastic around the entire perimeter to prevent it from riding up while you’re trying to rest. Dedicated To Providing Your Home With Luxurious Textiles: At Modern Threads, we've been dedicated to providing quality textiles at the intersection of luxury and functionality for over 40 years. As a family-owned brand, we understand your priorities in arranging a modern and comfortable home. That's why we source only the best materials and craft luxurious products to last for years to come. Every item is designed with care by our California studio team.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Super Soft, Luxurious Feel Super soft and comfortable sheets. Made from the highest quality microfiber and designed to be durable, long-lasting and luxurious. Perfect for your bedroom, guest room and as a gift for a loved one.

Durable, Long Lasting Comfort This Sheet set provides a lasting vibrancy of color no matter how often they are washed and are made of high strength cotton and polyester yarns that will stay soft silky and wrinkle free for years. Soft to the touch, easy care.
Machine Washable Machine washable and dryer safe. Recommended - Machine wash gentle cycle with cold water. Sun dry or low tumble dry.

Perfect For All-Season Made from 100% microfiber its breathable yet cozy, making it the ideal choice for year-round comfort. Extra Deep Pocket Fitted Sheet Have a deep-pocket mattress? No worries. Our smooth fitted sheet fits mattresses up to 18" deep. Plus, it has elastic all around, not just at the corners. So, it stays snug all night - no more annoying ride-up. Amrapur Overseas Amrapur Overseas Inc. is a family operated home textile company with over 40 years of experience. Our products are proudly made from reliable materials and trusted sources.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality and very reasonably priced
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a twin set of these sheets to match a quilt I made for a guest bedroom along with a different set of another brand, which I paid more for. This set is far superior to the higher priced ones. They are a better quality, softer, no wrinkles after washing. Because I liked them so much and they are priced so reasonably, I decided to try them on my own bed. I love them. In fact, I just ordered additional sets for the rest of the beds in our home. These are the nicest sheet sets that I have found in years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very shabby chic
reviews.reviewText: These sheets are wonderful... Very soft yet durable... Love the subtle print on these sheets...great value

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were inexpensive microfiber sheets so I didn't expect very much of them. I was pleasantly surprised at the quality and the feel is soft and smooth. I love the rose flower print on them. I really needed a pair of sheets that didn't ride up or come off at the corners. So far I've only had them a short time but the sheets stay in place and don't ride up at the corners and that was very important to me. The last hundred percent cotton sheets I had on my bed they slid all around on top and the corners kept coming up and off. It was very frustrating. I haven't washed the sheets yet so I'm hoping that goes well but so far I really love them. They fit my deep pockets well at 14 inches and I love that the pillow cases are nice and roomy and long. They completely cover my pillow which my last set of cotton sheets did not do. I'm happy so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty nice sheets!
reviews.reviewText: Don’t get me wrong, these are some of the nicer sheets I own. They are beautiful for one, but also so soft and cozy. Also, they don’t cling lint and stuff. That being said, they are much better in the colder or chillier seasons. I won’t be using them in the summer because I just don’t feel like they breathe much- they aren’t thick though! So don’t worry about that. So I wouldn’t say they are cooling for sleep but definitely cozy, comfy, soft, the right amount of thickness. I also wash my bedding weekly and I have not noticed them degrading in any way and have been using them consistently since purchasing. I’d definitely purchase again, for another beautiful print.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are really pretty and soft and comfortable. They don’t feel cheap at all. They wash well and I haven’t noticed any fading or shrinkage or any other issues. Easily fits my deep mattress. Glad I made this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Such cute beddding and so soft. Feels great quality for the price! Fits my full/queen bed (:

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweet and soft
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't sure about microfiber...I'm a cotton girl....but I fell for the sweet little roses and the crazy low price and figured what the heck...I'll return if I don't like em. Well....I washed them line dried them and was surprised how well they fit both my bed and pillows and they are soft but not wierd feeling. I slept well last night ...no difference from cotton. $25 for a Queen set!!! I quickly ordered another!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm in LOVE
reviews.reviewText: These sheets are DIVINE. Soft, silky, and romantic beautiful print. I can't wait to sleep in them tonight. I love that this is a small business. I try to support small biz as much as I can. Thank you for the wonderful sheets! They match my new Laura Ashley Quilt! 😻
Looks prettier in person. Very soft and comfy after 1st Wash. Good quality for the price

These sheets reminded me of my childhood at the cottage,, so I ordered them! I was a little leary that being microfiber they may stretch out as some do, but theyre excellent. They wash well and look great! Reasonably priced too.

Son unas sábanas muy cómodas, en las épocas de calor se mantienen frescas, no hacen efecto térmico es decir no sudas a causa de ellas, no se resbalan, se adaptan muy bien a un tamaño King, son fáciles de lavar y de doblar, su estilo Coquette las hace lucir elegantes y bonitas. Sin duda son de las mejores elecciones que puedes hacer. Las fundas para las almohadas tienen las mismas características son frescas y cómodas.
Son bonitas y parecen de buena calidad.Veremos qué pasa con la siguiente lavada
